Santa_Clara.San Jose State University:
San José State University (commonly referred to as San Jose State or SJSU) is a public comprehensive university located in San Jose, California, in Silicon Valley. SJSU is the oldest public university in California, as well as the founding campus of the California State University (CSU) system.
Located in Downtown San Jose, the SJSU main campus is situated on 154 acres (62 ha), or roughly 19 square blocks.
